update t_room_check set hotel_id = #{hotelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, checkin_time = #{checkinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, checkout_time = #{checkoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(distinct hotel_id) from t_room_check where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select from t_room_check where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by checkin_time desc
